resources.string: No account yet? Signup right now.

Yoga is a mind and body practice. Various styles of yoga combine physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation or relaxation. A regular yoga practice can promote endurance, strength, calmness, flexibility, and well-being.

By definition, Pilates is a system of repetitive exercises performed on a mat or other equipment to promote strength, stability, and flexibility. Pilates exercises develop the body through muscular effort that stems from the core.

Running has been increasingly popular for decades. That’s not surprising considering its exercise brags: It requires little equipment. It’s a workout you can do on your own time and take with you if you’re away from home (no gym or class times to worry about). It’s efficient. And it can be great for boosting cardiovascular fitness.
Skipping has a whole host of benefits, and not just because it allows you to feel like you’re in the playground again. A skipping rope workout is fun, high intensity and cheap, too.
